frontmatter.title: Added gift card support, user account improvements

markdownRemark.html:
We're excited to announce that we have released a new version of vwa.la with gift card support! This means you can now pay your referrer's their commission with a Shopify gift card. You can read more about this feature here.

We've also made some improvements to our user account management features. Referrer's can now change their user name and email address.

Thanks to all who've given their feedback this week.
